metadata.title: CVE-2023-38285 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
Trustwave ModSecurity 3.x before 3.0.10 has Inefficient AlgorithmicComplexity.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-38285` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmodsecurity3t64 - 3.0.12-1.1build2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: modsecurity package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.12-1.1build2').
